DestructiveDilemnaInclusion (python class)
=========================================================================

.. seealso::
   :ref:`math concept<destructive_dilemna_math_inference_rule>` | :ref:`python declaration class<destructive_dilemna_declaration_python_class>` | :ref:`python sample<destructive_dilemna_python_sample>`

This section presents the :python:`DestructiveDilemnaInclusion` python class.

This class models the :ref:`inclusion<object_inclusion_math_concept>` of the :ref:`destructive-dilemna<destructive_dilemna_math_inference_rule>` :ref:`inference-rule<inference_rule_math_concept>` in the target :ref:`theory-elaboration-sequence<theory_elaboration_sequence_math_concept>`.

*Punctilious* users do not need to instanciate objects from this class. In effect, the :python:`TheoryElaborationSequence` class exposes the :python:`destructive_dilemna` property, and instanciation is automatic when this property is accessed for the first time.

.. module:: punctilious
   :noindex:
.. autoclass:: DestructiveDilemnaInclusion
   :members:
